text: The 1983 Vuelta a España was the 38th edition of the Vuelta a España, one of cycling's Grand Tours. The Vuelta began in Almussafes, with a prologue individual time trial on 19 April, and Stage 10 occurred on 29 April with a stage to Soria. The race finished in Madrid on 8 May. ==Prologue== 19 April 1983 — Almussafes to Almussafes, (ITT) {| |Prologue result and general classification after Prologue {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank !
